title: Petersburg National Battlefield: People
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People               People      Biographies  Explore the lives of the civilians and soldiers that shaped this event.   African-Americans at the Siege For many African-Americans the journey from slave to citizen passed through the siege of Petersburg. Click here to read a new article (USCTs in the Opening Assaults on Petersburg - July, 2012) written by Park Ranger Emmanuel Dabney.  Regiments That Served Here Approximately 800 regiments of nearly 160,000 soldiers, combined, served here in the trenches of Petersburg.
